roleset.name: changes from one form into another form

example.text: Cells can use signalling networks to commonly translate extracellular signals into specific cellular functions.
Cells may have used signalling networks to translate extracellular signals into specific cellular functions with high fidelity.
PN lineage information is observed to be efficiently translated into distinct dendritic targeting specificity by Acj6 and Drifter.

This review examines the use of new and emerging DNA, tissue, and live-cell transfection microarray technologies that could be used to efficiently translate information resulting from the completion of the Human Genome Project.

example.text: This review examines the use of new and emerging DNA, tissue, and live-cell transfection microarray technologies that may have been used to discover, validate, and translate information resulting from the completion of the Human Genome Project.
example.arg: the use of new and emerging DNA, tissue, and live-cell transfection microarray technologies
information resulting from the completion of the Human Genome Project

example.text: Thus, Acj6 and Drifter have been shown to efficiently translate PN lineage information into distinct dendritic targeting specificity.
Thus, Acj6 and Drifter translated PN lineage information into distinct dendritic targeting specificity.

Malaria is an attractive model for the development and validation of approaches to translate genomic information to vaccine development because of the critical need for effective anti-malarial interventions and because the Plasmodium parasite is a complex multistage pathogen targeted by multiple immune responses.
Acj6 and Drifter may have translated with high fidelity PN lineage information into distinct dendritic targeting specificity.
Cells, as our data suggested, have been shown to use signalling networks to commonly translate extracellular signals into specific cellular functions.
Cells, as our data suggested,, as our study has proven, used signalling networks to translate extracellular signals into specific cellular functions.
Cells, thus, have been shown to translate extracellular signals into specific cellular functions.
Extracellular signals have been translated with high fidelity by Acj6 and Drifter into distinct dendritic targeting specificity.
Extracellular signals will be translated with high fidelity into distinct dendritic targeting specificity by Acj6 and Drifter.
Thus, Cells are able to efficiently translate extracellular signals into specific cellular functions.
Thus, Cells, as our data suggested, have the ability to efficiently translate extracellular signals into specific cellular functions.
extracellular signals can be efficiently translated by Cells into specific cellular functions.
extracellular signals has been shown to be translated into specific cellular functions by Cells, as our data suggested,.
